Data @ ENS

CFM-ENS Data Science Chair

Welcome to the CFM-ENS Chair “Modèles et Sciences des Données” of the ENS.

Goal

This chair is organized around data sciences in a broad sense with the goal of bringing together researchers with diverse backgrounds (including for instance mathematics, computer science, physics, chemistry and neuroscience) but a common interest in dealing with large scale or high dimensional data.

The main activities of the chair are:

  • It organizes the monthly Data Science Colloquium of the ENS.
  • It hosts the “Laplace Junior Professor Chair in Data Science” program, see the job openings announcements for more details.
  • It supports the Challenge Data program.

Scientific Committee

  • Florent Krzakala (ENS and UPMC): director ;
  • Stéphane Mallat (ENS) ;
  • Pascal Mamassian (CNRS and ENS) ;
  • Gabriel Peyré (CNRS and ENS).
